snippet: The Schaulager - an appointment-only exhibition space, storage and study center in Münchenstein, Switzerland, that houses the extraordinary contemporary art collection of the Emanuel Hoffman Foundation - has opened a dramatic temporary pavilion...
abstract: The Schaulager - an appointment-only exhibition space, storage and study center in Münchenstein, Switzerland, that houses the extraordinary contemporary art collection of the Emanuel Hoffman Foundation - has opened a dramatic temporary pavilion designed by the Swiss architects Herzog & de Meuron next to the Art Basel fair.

headline.main: Schaulager Museum Sets Up Temporary Outpost at Art Basel
